examples.example: 这个星期我过得非常充实且有意义。

translate.english: I had a very fulfilling and meaningful week.

examples.example: 每个星期我都会抽出时间去陪伴家人，共享温馨时光。

translate.english: Every week I will set aside time to accompany my family and share the warm moments together.

examples.example: 下星期我们计划去郊游，一起享受美好的大自然。

translate.english: We plan to go for an outing next week and enjoy the beautiful nature together.
